data.name: Runaway Princess
data.detailed_description:
※All characters in this game are 18 or older.

■Story

Once upon a time, there was a normal country with normal peace.

But these days, the forces of the demon lord came out of nowhere,
and is causing trouble.

So the king plans to make his own daughter marry with the descendant of a proper, and noble hero

in order to boost the spirits of citizens.

His daughter is beautiful clever, and attractive. Just flawless.

That kind of girl is gonna marry to a hero of the country.
Any kind of person would have celebrated them...


But, her attractiveness was not her true character.

She could not endure his father, who tried to utilize her for political reasons.

So she leaves the castle...

■Deposit system that saves tons of money!


■Easy symbol-encountering system battle, and ordinary turn-based RPG!

■Message-skip function available!

■Hideable message boxes!

■Simplified Map display!

■Unique and interesting dungeons that won't make you bored!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10, 8, 7
  • Processor: CPU：IntelR PentiumR4 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains the following sexual content
・Strong language 
・Sexual language
